017
018package com.scivicslab.actoriac;
019
020import java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException;
021import java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService;
022import java.util.logging.Level;
023import java.util.logging.Logger;
024
025import org.json.JSONObject;
026
027import com.scivicslab.actoriac.log.DistributedLogStore;
028import com.scivicslab.actoriac.log.LogLevel;
029import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.core.ActionResult;
030import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.core.ActorRef;
031import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.core.accumulator.Accumulator;
032import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.workflow.IIActorRef;
033import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.workflow.IIActorSystem;
034
035/**
036 * Accumulator actor reference that also logs to H2 database.
037 *
038 * <p>This class extends the standard accumulator functionality to also write
039 * logs to the H2LogStore for persistent storage. Each node's output is stored
040 * with the node ID for later querying.</p>
041 *
042 * <p>Database writes are performed asynchronously using a dedicated single-threaded
043 * executor to avoid blocking workflow execution. The logStore actor ensures all
044 * DB writes are serialized.</p>
045 *
046 * <h2>Supported Actions</h2>
047 * <ul>
048 *   <li>{@code add} - Adds a result and logs to database</li>
049 *   <li>{@code getSummary} - Returns formatted summary of all results</li>
050 *   <li>{@code getCount} - Returns the number of added results</li>
051 *   <li>{@code clear} - Clears all accumulated results</li>
052 * </ul>
053 *
054 * @author devteam@scivics-lab.com
055 * @since 2.9.0
056 */
057public class LoggingAccumulatorIIAR extends IIActorRef<Accumulator> {
058
059    private final Logger logger;
060    private final ActorRef<DistributedLogStore> logStoreActor;
061    private final ExecutorService dbExecutor;
062    private final long sessionId;
063
064    /**
065     * Constructs a new LoggingAccumulatorIIAR.
066     *
067     * @param actorName the name of this actor
068     * @param object the Accumulator implementation
069     * @param system the actor system
070     * @param logStoreActor the actor reference for the distributed log store
071     * @param dbExecutor the dedicated executor service for DB writes (should be single-threaded)
072     * @param sessionId the session ID for this workflow execution
073     */
074    public LoggingAccumulatorIIAR(String actorName, Accumulator object, IIActorSystem system,
075                                   ActorRef<DistributedLogStore> logStoreActor,
076                                   ExecutorService dbExecutor, long sessionId) {
077        super(actorName, object, system);
078        this.logger = Logger.getLogger(actorName);
079        this.logStoreActor = logStoreActor;
080        this.dbExecutor = dbExecutor;
081        this.sessionId = sessionId;
082    }
083
084    @Override
085    public ActionResult callByActionName(String actionName, String arg) {
086        logger.fine(String.format("actionName = %s, arg = %s", actionName, arg));
087
088        try {
089            switch (actionName) {
090                case "add":
091                    return handleAdd(arg);
092
093                case "getSummary":
094                    return handleGetSummary();
095
096                case "getCount":
097                    return handleGetCount();
098
099                case "clear":
100                    return handleClear();
101
102                default:
103                    logger.warning("Unknown action: " + actionName);
104                    return new ActionResult(false, "Unknown action: " + actionName);
105            }
106        } catch (Exception e) {
107            logger.log(Level.SEVERE, "Error in " + actionName, e);
108            return new ActionResult(false, "Error: " + e.getMessage());
109        }
110    }
111
112    /**
113     * Handles the add action.
114     *
115     * <p>Adds the result to the accumulator (for console output) and also
116     * logs to the H2 database for persistent storage. Database writes are
117     * performed asynchronously via the logStore actor to avoid blocking.</p>
118     *
119     * @param arg JSON object with source, type, and data fields
120     * @return ActionResult indicating success or failure
121     */
122    private ActionResult handleAdd(String arg) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException {
123        JSONObject json = new JSONObject(arg);
124        String source = json.getString("source");
125        String type = json.getString("type");
126        String data = json.getString("data");
127
128        // Add to accumulator (console output)
129        this.tell(acc -> acc.add(source, type, data)).get();
130
131        // Log to H2 database asynchronously via logStore actor
132        if (logStoreActor != null && sessionId >= 0) {
133            // source = node ID (e.g., "node-192.168.1.1")
134            // type = transition YAML snippet (what step is being executed)
135            // data = command output
136            // Fire-and-forget: don't wait for DB write to complete
137            logStoreActor.tell(
138                store -> store.logAction(sessionId, source, type, "executeCommand", 0, 0L, data),
139                dbExecutor);
140        }
141
142        return new ActionResult(true, "Added");
143    }
144
145    /**
146     * Handles the getSummary action.
147     *
148     * @return ActionResult with the formatted summary
149     */
150    private ActionResult handleGetSummary() throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException {
151        String summary = this.ask(Accumulator::getSummary).get();
152        return new ActionResult(true, summary);
153    }
154
155    /**
156     * Handles the getCount action.
157     *
158     * @return ActionResult with the count
159     */
160    private ActionResult handleGetCount() throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException {
161        int count = this.ask(Accumulator::getCount).get();
162        return new ActionResult(true, String.valueOf(count));
163    }
164
165    /**
166     * Handles the clear action.
167     *
168     * @return ActionResult indicating success
169     */
170    private ActionResult handleClear() throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException {
171        this.tell(Accumulator::clear).get();
172        return new ActionResult(true, "Cleared");
173    }
174}
